description:
Ducky Quacky is 3D Platformer Game,

Our main character is a Duck living in Duckland.
He's a Duckish!
You must collect all the keys in the levels,
Open the lock and go to the next level.
I think it's a good idea to collect apples in levels.
Some sections have Merchants who can sell you some clothes for Apples!

There are enemies in the levels.
You can beat them with your duck voice!


Features;
20 Cute and Unique designed levels.
Clothing System, You can buy accessories, cloths from Merchants.
Beat enemies with your Duck Voice.
Collect All Keys,
Collect Apples,
and Ducks!
name: Ducky Quacky
